Package edu.purdue.cs.percolator

Class AutoGrader

java.lang.Object
edu.purdue.cs.percolator.AutoGrader
public final class AutoGrader
extends Object
The AutoGrader class contains builder methods to create an auto-grader for a grading platform. AutoGrader currently only supports Gradescope.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static AutoGrader grade​(Class<?>[] testSuites)
    Creates a new AutoGrader with the given test suites.
    AutoGrader onGradescope()
    Specifies the grading platform to be Gradescope.
    void run()
    Runs the grader and outputs the results to System.out.
    AutoGrader withMaxScore​(double maxScore)
    Specifies a maximum score for the test suites.
    AutoGrader withStyleChecker​(StyleChecker styleChecker)
    Specifies a StyleChecker object to run a code style audit with after grading.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • grade

      public static AutoGrader grade​(Class<?>[] testSuites)
      Creates a new AutoGrader with the given test suites. The maximum score defaults to 100. The grading platform defaults to Gradescope.
      Parameters:
      testSuites - the classes to test
      Returns:
      a new AutoGrader object

    • withMaxScore

      public AutoGrader withMaxScore​(double maxScore)
      Specifies a maximum score for the test suites.
      Parameters:
      maxScore - the maximum score for the test suites
      Returns:
      the AutoGrader with the new max score

    • withStyleChecker

      public AutoGrader withStyleChecker​(StyleChecker styleChecker)
      Specifies a StyleChecker object to run a code style audit with after grading.
      Parameters:
      styleChecker - the style checker to run
      Returns:
      the AutoGrader with the new style checker

    • onGradescope

      public AutoGrader onGradescope()
      Specifies the grading platform to be Gradescope. Grading output will be formatted as Gradescope-compliant JSON.
      Returns:
      the AutoGrader with the new platform setting

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the grader and outputs the results to System.out.
